message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm not comfortable with $13,000 either. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can we meet somewhere in between?
